contentencoded:
There's a lot of ways to pay for things these days without using cash. Credit and debit cards are the biggest, but mobile payments, like Google Wallet and plenty others, might be the next big thing.

Marketplace's Adriene Hill joins Mark Garrison to explain which mobile payment option is right for you and why cash isn't dead just yet.
